snippet.title: Yi Xian: The Cultivation Card Game - Gameplay Trailer (Online Card Deck Building Game)
snippet.description:
Yixian Card is an online card deck building game (DBG) with a background of cultivating immortals. Every game is a deck building experience from scratch. Players will start to practice from the Qi refining period, gradually break through the realm, and obtain stronger cards. By changing cards, the deck will continue to grow and become stronger, with a powerful combination of routines, and finally defeat all opponents to win.

《弈仙牌》是一款修仙背景的在线卡组构筑游戏（DBG）。每局游戏都是一场从零开始的卡组构筑体验。玩家将从炼气期开始修炼，逐步突破境界，获得更强的卡牌。通过换牌让卡组不断成长变强，搭配出强大的套路组合，最终击败全部对手获得胜利。

#YiXan #TheCultivationCardGame #易仙 #hdplaygaming
